about_the_game:
Cafe Rosa is a cafe management simulator and your chance to become the cafe owner of your dreams.
Serve delicious dishes and drinks to your customers and earn coins.
Use the coins to create your original cafe!


・Customizable Cafe: Customize the interior and equipment to create your very own cafe. Attract customers with stylish decorations and efficient facilities.
・Upgrade your equipment: Collect coins to upgrade your equipment and earn more coins and reputation. You can improve your restaurant with a more efficient kitchen.


・Customers are unique: Each customer has a different personality. Some are in a hurry, others want to relax. You will be able to recognize the characteristics of your customers and provide the best service possible.
・Meet new customers: As your cafe's reputation grows, new customers will arrive. Some of them may be difficult to deal with...?


・Main Character Abilities: Enhance your main character's abilities to gain an advantage in managing the cafe. Unlock various abilities, such as increasing the tips you receive from customers.

If you keep customers waiting too long, they will get angry and leave! Be on time and aim for a bustling cafe.

Start running the cafe of your dreams with Cafe Rosa! The key to success lies in your hands.
